## Vault.copy() method

Create a copy of a file or folder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
copy<T extends TAbstractFile>(file: T, newPath: string): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>file</code> | <code>T</code> | The file or folder. |
|  <code>newPath</code> | <code>string</code> | <p>Vault absolute path for the new copy.</p><p> 1.8.7</p> |

**Returns:**

`Promise<T>`
